subject: p17189198
Findings: Bilateral interstitial and airspace opacitification, predominantly basal has worsened substantially since. Moderate enlargement of the cardiac silhouette and hilar vasculature are chronic. Small bilateral pleural effusions are presumed.
Impression: Recurrent, moderately severe, pulmonary edema, worsened since. Bibasilar opacification, likely edema and atelectasis.
